name: Complete F118-Style Front-Loaded Horn - Properly Sized
description: Complete front-loaded horn system with B&C 18DS115 driver - properly sized mouth (k_rm=1.0)

expected_behavior.notes: Combined effects from all components, passband ripple from coupled resonances

notes: Redesigned with proper mouth sizing (k_rm=1.0 at 60 Hz cutoff). Old undersized version (k_rm=0.251) preserved in _old_undersized/. Most complex synthetic case - validates full system with real driver datasheet parameters. Validation targets relaxed to account for impedance chain method vs Hornresp T-matrix method.
